item.title: Fireworks
item.description: Happy Birthday My Dear Sister! Fireworks on a speacial day, for my lovely sis! Happy B-Day !

item.title: Starfield
item.description: Starfield generation! Finished Product: This is a p5js sketch where I’m trying to generate a starfield, kind of like warp travel often shown in movies. Enjoy!

item.title: Header Image Creation
item.description: Header Image Creation In this project, I’m going to try to create a header image using p5.js javascript library. Let’s see how this goes! Press enter to save the generated image! p5 Canvas:

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to the about page! So what is this website about? This website is made for the sole purpose of showing the web development and javascript coding skills of the author. Basically it’s purpose is to serve as a portfolio. Source code of the web page and all the projects is (or will be) available on GitHub as a repository. It’s heavily inspired by The Coding Train website, and this whole idea is inspired by the host of The Coding Train, Daniel Shiffman.

item.title: First Project
item.description:
First Project!

So, this is another one of those testing things… Let me see how does it work with just a small amount of text.

item.title: First Page
item.description:
This is the First Page!

I am trying really hard to get this theme or template, call it whatever you want, to work! The plan is to make this text appear in a card on homepage, and also the image! I am going to try to put the image before and after text, and test what does the content variable take… Also plan is to truncate this text, so that the card stays the same height always!
